entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Globalization for Server/Auto Resets After Initial Load #52885
  • Determine how to build aspnetcore's hosting bundle #52884
  • Perf regression: json, json #52883
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #52882
  • Request model binding with `FromQuery` properties `AsParameters` results in all properties being required. #52881
    9.0-preview1
  • EventCallbackFactory has wrong nullability annotations for all callback parameters. #52872
  • Post request does not render end state of components on SSR page #52871
    8.0.x
  • NET8: DefaultObjectPool<T>.Get() method returns null under multi-threads, seems not thread-safe with NET8 and throws exception, while no problem with NET7 #52873
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52870

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext #52862
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52869
  • Blazor hosted webassembly NavigationManager NavigateTo causing client navigation instead of silent history.pushState #52256
  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51175
    Planning: WebUI
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo not navigating in specific case (.NET 8 RC2) #51288
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Client diffing bug #50877
    Planning: WebUI
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Counter_Counter Section_Name role value: The purpose of the "click me" button is not clear from the provided label #51152
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor WASM, SSR and CDNs #46734
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM: Javascript/css not compressing when using Brotli web.config #51166
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Expose the functionality in internal EndpointHtmlRenderer for integrating frameworks #51148
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor crash in render diff internals #51267
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Analyzer] Verify Blazor route type constraints are specified with all lower-case letters #44252
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor wasm AuthorizeView's NotAuthorized section executes before the authentication state returns #30765
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor cannot find entrypoint when a library from another folder is referenced. #30594
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server and CkEditor problem #52855
  • Shadow copying for ASP.NET Core 8 seems to be broken #52525
  • Certificate need to save manually in local to run the application #52679

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve debug views of dictionaries #52867
    area-networking

Merged

  • [Dependency update] Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23618.1 #52877
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x
